abstract.t: For some location-based applications, such as emergency calling orroadside assistance, it appears that the identity of the requestor isless important than accurate and trustworthy location information.To ensure adequate help location has to be left untouched by the endpoint or by entities in transit.This document lists different threats, an adversary model, outlinesthree frequentlly discussed solutions and discusses operationalconsiderations. Finally, the document concludes with a suggestion onhow to move forward.
